Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2017 01:55PM 1214Survivor wrote: Thanks for starting this group! I had my implants surgery on 4 Jan 17, day before my birthday. Next day, I had my new girls! Yesterday was week 3, post-surgery, and I'm feeling ok. Been walking 12-16K steps a day, 60-90+ min. Lymph nodes were removed so arms feel funny but I'm supposed to wear compression sleeves (often forget or it's too hot in San Antonio). Can't exercise arms until Mar but the end is in site! All the best to everyone!
Posts.Title: January 2017 Surgery Group BeachBabyK Elem
